comments.author: matthew hawthorne
comments.body:
This patch includes 2 modifications:
1) Adds link to "HttpClient Cache" module in left "module" list
2) Adds link to benchmarking doc in HttpClient Cache docs under "External Documentation"

comments.author: Jon Moore
comments.body: Patch is committed to trunk; still waiting on getting it published to the live dev site.

comments.author: Jon Moore
comments.body: Assigning to Oleg for the final publish to the live website, since he offered. :)

description: I'd like to add a link into the HttpClient docs detailing some benchmarking we did with the HttpClient Cache module.
summary: Add link to "Benchmarking the HttpClient Caching Module" article from Comcast Interactive Media
